    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">V novo leto jaz hitim - igra</string>
            <string language="en">Entering new year - play</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hereinkommendes neues Jahr - Spiel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Nouvelle année entrante - jeu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ano novo entrando - jogo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nuovo anno entrante - gioco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισάγοντας το νέο έτος - παιχνίδι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Año Nuevo que entra - juego</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Napisala sem igro ob novem letu, v kateri lahko igra veliko učencev.</string>
            <string language="en">Play about new year that can be played my many students.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">igra</string>
            <string language="en">play</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">dramatizacija</string>
            <string language="en">dramatisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">novo leto</string>
            <string language="en">new year</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spielen Sie über neues Jahr, dem gespielt werden 
kann meine vielen Kursteilnehmer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jouez au sujet de la nouvelle année qui peut 
être jouée mes beaucoup d'étudiants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogue sobre o ano novo que pode ser jogado meus 
muitos estudantes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gioc circa il nuovo anno che può essere giocato i
miei molti allievi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παιχνίδι για το νέο έτος που μπορεί να παιχτεί τους 
πολλούς σπουδαστές μου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juegue sobre el Año Nuevo que se puede jugar mis 
muchos estudiantes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">dramatisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">neues Jahr</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jeu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dramatisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nouvelle année</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">jogo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">nuovo anno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παιχνίδι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
